sentence.Network_en: Greet Urbanus, our fellow worker in Christ, and my dear friend Stachys.
sentence.Network_cn: 又问在基督里与我们同工的耳巴奴, 并我所亲爱的士大古安.

sentence.Network_en: KJV Salute Urbane, our helper in Christ, and Stachys my beloved.
sentence.Network_cn: [新译]问候在基督里与我们同工的珥巴努和我亲爱的士达古.

sentence.Network_en: Greet Urbanus , our fellow worker in Christ, and Stachys my beloved.
